title: Citigroup Treasurer Mike Verdeschi to Present at BancAnalysts Association of Boston Conference
summary: New York – Mike Verdeschi, Treasurer of Citigroup, will present at the BancAnalysts Association of Boston Conference on Thursday, November 3. The presentation is expected to begin at approximately 8:55 a.m. (Eastern). A live webcast will be available at https://www.citigroup.com/global/investors. A replay and transcript of the webcast will be available shortly after the event.

tag-3: CitiCiti is a preeminent banking partner for institutions with cross-border needs, a global leader in wealth management and a valued personal bank in its home market of the United States. Citi does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions, providing corporations, governments, investors, institutions and individuals with a broad range of financial products and services.
